name: Nihilistic Bouncehouse
description:
the win conditions are nearly impossible to achieve (one of which is completely random) - and this, i believe, is the perfect picture of my ba in philosophy

play as nietzsche. try to bounce on all copies of ecce homo before they reset and all of this before the end of the song, and try not to drown in the abyss of your own witticisms. it's, you know, self-referential, considering that nietzsche's philosophy of nihilism is completely taken out of context by mopey people who don't realize he talks about REJECTING nihilism and all

anyway, i own nothing
